underlying_goal: Implement a multi-phase robustness and performance improvement plan for STEP 1-8, then identify and implement FE/BE integration opportunities discovered during testing
brief_summary: User asked Claude to implement a 5-phase robustness/performance improvement plan across 6 files, then analyze and implement FE/BE integration opportunities; the first plan was fully implemented with Codex review fixes, and the second task was in planning stage when the session ended.
